Source.Name: xfce4-notes-plugin
Source.Description: xfce4-notes-plugin is a notes panel plugin for the Xfce Desktop Environment. It provides a simple system for managing sticky notes on your desktop.

Update.Comment: - Set Notebook tab reorderable via drag and drop - Link to Math lib (-lm) useful for lib/color.c - Try to open a link with exo-open first - Bump GTK+ version to 2.14 - Properly save notes when leaving (handle UNIX TERM and INT signals) - Rework the GTK+ RC theme with custom scrollbars, a shaded title bar and replaced the close button against a self painted widget with Cairo - Align the note name in the title bar on the left near the menu icon - Restore tab orientation when the tab label changes (bug #6246) - Reorganize right click title bar menu and add new item "About" - Renamed sub-menu "Go" into "Groups" (bug #6249) - New right click menu option in panel "Add new group" - Fix undo feature not working after a small delay - Fix sticky window not being restored and reset "keep-above" after hidding - Updated translations: Kazakh, Catalan, Russian, Ukrainian, Hungarian, Galician, Japanese, Czech, French, German, Danish, Basque, Latvian, Slovak, Portuguese
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Version bump: - Update translations. - Unique support has been introduced as a hard-dependency (because you just can't provide soft-dependencies when building from Vala sources) - The plugin is provided both as a panel plugin and as a standalone app that sits in the notification area (a menu item is available under Accessories) - A context menu to go to a specific notes-group appears in the context menu (right click the panel plugin or the systray icon) - Navigation bar can be set on/off in the settings dialog - The tabs can be positioned instead of only on/off - The top-right/left corners are no more resizable - A cursor handle to resize on the right/left is displayed - Some minor esthetic changes - Small bug fixes * Add new dependency: libunique. * Add new path files.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Version bump: - Show tabs option is back in the settings dialog - Deleting the last note also deletes the window (bug #5535) - Rework window default visiblity - Keep order of notes (bug #5534) - Updated translations: Danish, Basque, Urdu, Catalan, Turkish, Japanese, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Asturian, Romanian, Portuguese, Spanish.
